purpose: To analyze and categorize different LLM agents, providing a detailed survey of their capabilities and applications.
principle: Compiles and synthesizes research data on LLM agents, categorizing them by functionality and use cases.
reusability: The survey can be used as a reference for researchers and developers to understand the landscape of LLM agents.
limitations: The repository is primarily a survey and may not provide direct implementations or code for LLM agents.
name: LLM-Agent-Survey
description: Survey on LLM Agents (Published on CoLing 2025)
highlight: Comprehensive survey and analysis of various LLM agents, providing insights into their design and application.
